name: Super Mario /v/orld 2: Moot Point
summary: The SMW Rom Hacker known as 4chan returns! From the /v/ board yet again, this is a collaboration hack created from August 1st 2020 to September 28th, 2020. It showcases over 70 levels from over 30 different creators. New to this hack are custom resprites, which are based around memes and injokes from various eras of 4chan history.
